title: Daughter of Darkness
tags: journey to the house of grief
find a way into the cloister
content: aviours, we couldn't help but point out that it seemed manipulative to ensnare a child in such a way. We pointed out to Shadowheart that her memory of wandering a dark forest bore some resemblance to traditional Selûnite coming-of-age rites, where young children would have to navigate their way home with the aid of Selûne's moon glow. Shadowheart was troubled by the comparison. Shadowheart revealed to us that she has long-dreamed of becoming a Dark Justiciar. Her Mother Superior always thwarted
